trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SEQ_00<tab>An entreating look is painted on Managingway's face.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Paintingway at Lovingway's Darlings.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Paintingway.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SEQ_03<tab>Report back to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Paintingway at Lovingway's Darlings.

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Paintingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_TODO_02<tab>Report back to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Our imaging station has been awash with Ways eager to try their paws at painting.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>However, as with many of our endeavors, zealousness has overwhelmed available supply, and we find ourselves at a loss. A loss of paint, in this case.

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>Paintingway has just left for Lovingway's Darlings to gather the necessary supplies for more. Might you lend them your support? I haven't the heart to explain to another Way that we are currently out of Sunshine Yellow...
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_004<tab><blip> Ready and happy to provide for you.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_010<tab>What a relief to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was hoping I might ask for your help!

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_011<tab>I'm currently gathering mushrooms that will make our pigments sparkle something wonderful, but if you could help prepare some other supplies for me, our paint shall be done in half the time.

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_012<tab>You seem to know your way around metal, so could you grind me a glimmering powder? Our paint will blind our artists with its brilliance! ...Hopefully only metaphorically. This doing supporter should have any extra supplies you need.

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_013<tab>You seem to have clever fingers, so could you make me a small agitator? And before you try a person-joke, I mean the tool─I'll need it to mix the paint. This doing supporter should have any extra supplies you need.

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_014<tab>You seem to know how to mix a good concoction, so could you create me an additive to moderate hue? Sunshine Yellow is trickier than you'd think, and the Ways won't settle for Lemon anymore. This doing supporter should have any extra supplies you need.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_015<tab><blip> Oh no! You already have enough supplies. This supporter is currently unable to provide for you...
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_016<tab><blip> Oh no! You already have enough supplies. This supporter is currently unable to provide for you...
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_017<tab><blip> Oh no! You already have enough supplies. This supporter is currently unable to provide for you...
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_018<tab><blip> Huzzah! Your supply request is being processed. Please accept this supporter's allocation and eager encouragement.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_019<tab><blip> Huzzah! Your supply request is being processed. Please accept this supporter's allocation and eager encouragement.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_SUPPORTER4708_000_020<tab><blip> Huzzah! Your supply request is being processed. Please accept this supporter's allocation and eager encouragement.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_021<tab>Finished already?
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_022<tab>Lovely! Just what the artist ordered.
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_PAINTINGWAY_000_023<tab>I've finished up here, so I'll head back and start mixing. Thank you for your help, and do see Managingway about a reward─you've earned it!
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>Now, that is the look of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who has made a significant contribution to the happiness of artistic Loporrits!
TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>The drive to create with one's own paw─be it art or destiny─is nothing but inspirational. It truly demonstrates the strength of each of our Ways.

TEXT_BANLOP122_04708_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>Through the creativity you have been helping us cultivate, we are slowly awakening to our full potential. Self-congratulatory though it may sound to say, I do believe our future shines bright upon the horizon.
